title: Pics: Georgia Rocked By Protests Over Russia-EU Divide Within Country
content: Protesters and police clashed in Georgia's capital Tbilisi for a fifth straight night on Monday, with signs of opposition spreading across the country over the government's decision to suspend talks on joining the European Union.
summary: Protesters and police clashed in Georgia's capital Tbilisi for a fifth straight night on Monday, with signs of opposition spreading across the country over the government's decision to suspend talks on joining the European Union.

title: "Flagrant Violation": Lebanon Says 2 Killed In Israeli Strikes Despite Truce
content: At least two people were killed on Monday in Israeli strikes on southern Lebanon, Lebanese authorities said, as a ceasefire ending more than a year of hostilities between Israel and Lebanese armed group Hezbollah appeared increasingly fragile.
summary: At least two people were killed on Monday in Israeli strikes on southern Lebanon, Lebanese authorities said, as a ceasefire ending more than a year of hostilities between Israel and Lebanese armed group Hezbollah appeared increasingly fragile.

title: George Clooney "Furious" At Obama For Manipulating Him. Here's What Happened

title: China Accuses Philippine Ships Of "Illegally Gathering" At Disputed Reef

title: 3 Dead, 32 Hospitalised After Eating Endangered Sea Turtle In Philippines
content: Although hunting or consuming sea turtles is prohibited under the Philippines' environmental protection laws, these marine creatures continue to be consumed in some communities where they are considered a traditional delicacy.

title: At $126 Billion, Putin Allocated A 3rd Of Russia's Budget Solely To Defence
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin approved the country's budget for 2025 on Sunday, which includes record-breaking spending on military needs amid Moscow's ongoing assault against Ukraine.

title: Putin Invited To India By PM Modi, Visit Dates To Be Set In 2025: Kremlin
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has received an invitation to visit India from Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the dates for his visit will be set in early 2025, Kremlin aide Yury Ushakov said.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin has received an invitation to visit India from Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the dates for his visit will be set in early 2025, Kremlin aide Yury Ushakov said.

title: XRP Becomes Third Largest Cryptocurrency, Beats USDT And Solana

title: More Than 14,000 Satellites, 120 Million Pieces Of Debris Jamming Earth Orbit
content: The rapid increase in satellites and space junk will make low Earth orbit unusable unless companies and countries cooperate and share the data needed to manage that most accessible region of space, experts and industry insiders said.
summary: The rapid increase in satellites and space junk will make low Earth orbit unusable unless companies and countries cooperate and share the data needed to manage that most accessible region of space, experts and industry insiders said.

title: All About Hunter Biden's Case History, Reactions To Presidential Pardon
content: Reversing his past promises to not use the powers of the presidency for the benefit of his family, US President Joe Biden on Sunday issued an official pardon for his son, Hunter Biden, sparing him a possible prison sentence for two criminal cases.

title: New Zealand Scientists Dissect World's Rarest Spade-Toothed Whale
content: New Zealand scientists on Monday began dissecting a whale considered the rarest in the world, a species so elusive that only seven specimens have ever been documented.
summary: New Zealand scientists on Monday began dissecting a whale considered the rarest in the world, a species so elusive that only seven specimens have ever been documented.
